summary: Tania Raymonde  is an American actress that began acting at age twelve.
full_text: Tania Raymonde  is a Franco-American actress. She began her career in the recurring character of Cynthia Sanders in TV series Malcolm in the Middle between 2000 and 2002, followed by the role of Alex Rousseau in the ABC series Lost from 2006 to 2010. She has since played Carla Rinaldi on MTV's Death Valley , starred in the horror film Texas Chainsaw 3D  and portrayed Jodi Arias, the title role in the TV movie "Jodi Arias: Dirty Little Secret" . In April 2015, she joined the cast of the TNT series The Last Ship.
title: Tania Raymonde
